ee.sk.digidoc
Class Base64Util

java.lang.Object
  ee.sk.digidoc.Base64Util

public class Base64Util
extends java.lang.Object

Base64 utility methods. Based on an implementation by Apache, but changed to suit the needs of this project.

the String with encoded data

encode

public static java.lang.String encode(byte[] raw,
                                      int wrap)

Encode a byte array in Base64 format and return an optionally wrapped line

Parameters:
raw - byte[] data to be encoded
wrap - int length of wrapped lines; No wrapping if less than 4.
Returns:
a String with encoded data

encodeToBlock

public static int encodeToBlock(byte[] raw,
                                int rawLen,
                                java.lang.StringBuffer sb,
                                boolean bLastBlock)
                         throws java.io.IOException

Encodes a byte array in Base64 format and writes to StringBuffer object. For regular blocks writes only full lines and leaves the rest unused. Caller should check how many bytes were actually enocded and return the rest at the beginning of the next block

Parameters:
raw - byte[] data to be encoded
rawLen - number of bytes used in raw
sb - output buffer
bLastBlock - true if this is the last block to write
Returns:
number of raw bytes encoded and written to output stream. Thus
Throws:
java.io.IOException

encodeToStream

public static int encodeToStream(byte[] raw,
                                 java.io.OutputStream outs,
                                 boolean bLastBlock)
                          throws java.io.IOException

Encodes a byte array in Base64 format and writes to output stream. For regular blocks writes only full lines and leaves the rest unused. Caller should check how many bytes wre actually enocded and return the rest at the beginning of the next block

Parameters:
raw - byte[] data to be encoded
outs - output stream
bLastBlock - true if this is the last block to write
Returns:
number of raw bytes encoded and written to output stream. Thus
Throws:
java.io.IOException

decode

public static byte[] decode(byte[] base64)
Method decode

Parameters:
base64 -
Returns:

decodeBlock

public static int decodeBlock(java.lang.String base64,
                              java.io.OutputStream out,
                              boolean bLastBlock)

Decode a Base64-encoded string to a byte array and writes decoded data to output stream. Returns the number of bytes from input data used. Caller must pass in the unused bytes on the next call.

Parameters:
base64 - String encoded string. Whitespace will be ignored.
out - output stream to write decoded data
bLastBlock - true if this is the last block of input data
Returns:
number of handled bytes from input data

decode

public static byte[] decode(java.lang.String base64)

Decode a Base64-encoded string to a byte array

Parameters:
base64 - String encoded string (single line only !!)
Returns:
Decoded data in a byte array

decodeWithoutWhitespace

public static byte[] decodeWithoutWhitespace(java.lang.String base64)

Decode a Base64-encoded string to a byte array

This works only if you have stripped whitespace yourself

Parameters:
base64 - String encoded string (single line only !!)
Returns:
Decoded data in a byte array
